excerpt: This vegan pizza recipe is a spicy twist on a classic with buffalo cauliflower as the star. Get ready for a seriously delicious meal!

instructions.name: Make Pizza Dough
instructions: In a large bowl, mix together flour, instant yeast, salt, and sugar.
Add warm water and olive oil, and mix until a dough forms.
Knead the dough for 5 minutes on a floured surface, then place it back in the bowl and cover with a damp towel.
Let the dough rise for 30 minutes in a warm place.

instructions.name: Prep Buffalo Cauliflower
instructions: In a small pan, melt vegan butter over low heat.
Add hot sauce, garlic powder, onion powder, and black pepper to the pan and stir together.
Place cauliflower florets in a large bowl and pour the hot sauce mixture over them, tossing until florets are evenly coated.
Arrange the cauliflower in a single layer on a baking sheet and bake for 22-25 minutes, or until cauliflower is tender and slightly golden brown.

instructions.name: Assemble Pizza
instructions: Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface and transfer it to a pizza pan or baking sheet.
Spread vegan mozzarella cheese over the pizza dough, leaving a small border around the edges for the crust.
Add the buffalo cauliflower, distributing it evenly on the pizza.
Bake in the oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and cheese is melted.
Remove from the oven and top with chopped green onions and a drizzle of ranch dressing.
